none: media/user/SCRAPE/test/2014-01-the-total-end/extracted/the total end/05 Awaken The Beast_Chasing Nightmares
media/user/SCRAPE/test/2014-01-the-total-end/extracted/the total end/06 On With Our Lives
media/user/SCRAPE/test/2014-01-the-total-end/extracted/the total end/07 No Rest For The Dead
The Total End - Chasing Nightmares cassette 2003
The Total End - Chasing Nightmares cassette 2003

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on January 10, 2014 Description from Terminal Escape:
Maybe you missed this the first time around, do not make the same mistake today. Absolutely mandatory early-'00s crust. This floors me still every time I hear it, and I cannot understand why they are not emblazoned across every studded vest on both sides of the ocean. Members of a ton of other amazing bands, but this stands alone... CHASING NIGHTMARES While I'm bummed I can't see DASHER tonight in Atlanta, we are playing with ASSHOLE PARADE, HARSH WORDS and CHEAP ART, so that's pretty killer.
//2.bp.blogspot.com/-GPHZOO31VDc/Ur6yuXaKUYI/AAAAAAAAJUI/n9XyOEDCOyo/s1600/the+total+end+copy.jpg
